title: Solicit Guest Feedback Post-Stay
description: The day after a guest checks out, the system automatically sends them an email survey asking for feedback on their stay.

tasks.description: The system identifies all guests who checked out yesterday.
tasks.expected_outcome: A list of guests is generated.

tasks.description: The system sends a templated feedback survey email to each guest.
As guests complete the survey, their responses are automatically logged in the guest feedback platform for analysis.
tasks.expected_outcome: Survey responses are captured and stored.
